properties.address: Ottery St Mary Library, Silver Street, Ottery St Mary EX11 1DB
properties.description: You can sit in the warmth and use our free Wifi, book a computer, read a book or browse our newspapers. There are groups ranging from Bounce and Rhyme for babies and toddlers to Lego Club for children and Craft and a Cuppa & IT support for grown-ups.
properties.title: Ottery St Mary Library

properties.description: Open from 19/10/2022. All ages welcome Hot drinks and home baking 9-3, homemade soup and bread at lunchtime - all free. Highchair, and baby changing facilities.
properties.title: St Disen's Church, Bradninch

properties.description: We are a community centre open to anyone who would like to come. We have volunteers who will provide a warm welcome, board games and signpost to helpful organisations
properties.title: The Beehive/Honiton Town Council

hours._text: Tuesday-Friday 10am-10pm , Saturday and Sunday 10am - 4pm (changing in the new year)
